every time i open that page and open console.js i got that problem message:

(here are list of errors that appears at my console.log .. to help anyone who can see images) WebSocket connection to 'ws://m23.cloudmqtt.com:38788/mqtt' failed: Error during WebSocket handshake: net::ERR_CONNECTION_RESET mqttws31.js:979

"

Body: i edited my post and added text of errors
Please post text of errors rather than images then the information shows up in searched
What happens if you change the clientid to a random string?

You need to set the flag to enable SSL (as the picture of the ports suggests TLS is required for Websockets)

var options = {	  timeout: 3,	  onSuccess: onConnect,	  useSSL: true	};
it works after i added useSSL: true , it was my mistake that i didnt add username & password at var options
@hardillb ...you are such a boss of mqtt...lol...i see all mqtt questions answered by you

i have done this , i got now no error message . but my console just stuck at this (connecting to m23.cloudmqtt.com 38788)  . and when i checked my cloudmqtt server log i found those messages 	2018-03-01 17:42:26: Socket error on client <unknown>, disconnecting.	2018-03-01 17:42:26: Socket error on client <unknown>, disconnecting.	2018-03-01 17:43:11: Socket error on client <unknown>, disconnecting.	2018-03-01 17:43:12: Socket error on client <unknown>, disconnecting.	2018-03-01 17:45:29: Socket error on client <unknown>, disconnecting.)
